desc: Upcycled Ragamuffin Kitty art dolls and mixed-media home decor. We create unique art dolls and decor pieces using reclaimed fabrics, jewelry and other fun found objects. Our purpose is to create art that leaves the smallest carbon footprint possible. We've been saving ugly sweaters from landfills since 2018!

layout.text:
Handmade art dolls created with recycled fabrics and jewelry bits.
Saving ugly sweaters from landfills since 2018!
